content: single_crochet in last st row 3 ch1 turn single_crochet blo in 6 single_crochet slip_stitch into next 2 body sts repeat row 2 & 3 till you reach the other bottom corner end on a row 2 repeat turn your piece again so that you re working along the front edge ch7 row 1 turn single_crochet in second chain from the hook and next 5 chs slip_stitch into next 2 st of the body we will consider the bottom ribbing part of the body now so you ll work into the side of the ribbing the same way you did with the side of the panels row 2 turn skip 2 slip_stitch single_crochet blo in 5 single_crochet single_crochet in last st row 3 ch1 turn single_crochet blo in 6 single_crochet slip_stitch into next 2 body sts repeat row 2 & 3 till you reach the other bottom corner end on a row 3 repeat fo sleeves row 1 attach yarn to the first unworked stitch in armpit of sleeve hole ch2 single_crochet in second st *ch1 sk1 single_crochet in next* repeat ** to end of unworked sts ch1 extra row2 single_crochet in the first ch2 space *ch1 sk1 single_crochet in next ch1 space* repeat ** in continuous rounds till your sleeve reaches 2 5 from where you d like the end to lay sleeve taper single_crochet ch1 sk1 *sc3tog ch1 sk1 single_crochet ch1 sk1* repeat** for two full rounds you may continue more decreases if you prefer a snug cuff to sc3tog you re going to insert your hook through a ch1 space pull up a loop 2loops on hook skip the single_crochet insert your hook into the next ch1 space pull up a loop 3 loops on hook yarn over and pull through all 3 loops cuff row 1ch5 turn single_crochet in second chain from the hook single_crochet in 3 chs slip_stitch into two sleeve sts turn row 2 skip 2 slip_stitch single_crochet blo in 3 single_crochet single_crochet in last row 3 ch1 turn single_crochet blo in 4 single_crochet slip_stitch into 2 sleeve sts repeat row 2 & 3 around sleeve end end on row 2 repeat & matress stich ribbing together repeat all sleeve steps for second sleeve pockets pocket body ch17 row 1 single_crochet in second chain from the hook and across row 2 ch2 turn skip first st single_crochet *ch1 sk1 single_crochet* repeat ** to end row 3-10 ch2 turn skip first stich single_crochet into ch1 space *ch1 sk1 single_crochet into ch1 space* repeat ** to end pocket ribbing turn your work so that you are working the ribbing along the top of your pocket chain 5 row 1 turn single_crochet into second chain from the hook and next 3 chs row 2 slip_stitch into next 2 stitches of pocket body turn skip 2 slip_stitch single_crochet blo into 3 single_crochet single_crochet in last st ch1 row 3 turn single_crochet blo down 4 single_crochet repeat row 2 and 3 across the top of the pocket ending on a
